translations: n.红宝石（ruby 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 红宝石激光器；红宝石雷射

sentences.sentence: The crown was set with precious jewels—diamonds, rubies and emeralds.
sentences.translation: 王冠上镶嵌着稀世珍宝—有钻石、红宝石、绿宝石。

sentences.sentence: He had rubies and emeralds and diamonds stuck all over him.
sentences.translation: 他身上戴满了红宝石、绿宝石和钻石。

sentences.sentence: He waved a thin hand which ought really to have been covered with royal signet rings made of rubies.
sentences.translation: 他挥了挥手，那只纤细的手真应该戴满有王室徽章的红宝石戒指。
